headline: Jim Cramer Is Bullish on Goldman Sachs (GS): “It’s the Way to Go”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Put These 16 Stocks Under a Microscope. headline: George Santos Gets Seven Years for Stealing Campaign Funds
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Former US Representative George Santos, a onetime rising Republican star who falsely claimed to have worked for Goldman Sachs Group Inc. before running for Congress, was ordered to serve seven years and three months in prison for stealing campaign funds.Most Read from BloombergTrump Gives New York ‘One Last Chance’ to End Congestion FeeWhy Car YouTuber Matt Farah Is Fighting for Walkable CitiesBackyard Micro-Flats Aim to Ease South Africa’s Housing CrisisThe Racial Wealth Gap Is N

headline: Foreign Investors Dumped $63 Billion in US Equities, Goldman Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Foreign investors have sold $63 billion of US equities since the start of March, Goldman Sachs strategists estimate, noting that the data from high-frequency fund flows suggest that European investors have been driving the selling, while other regions have continued to buy US stocks.Most Read from BloombergTrump Gives New York ‘One Last Chance’ to End Congestion FeeWhy Car YouTuber Matt Farah Is Fighting for Walkable CitiesBackyard Micro-Flats Aim to Ease South Africa’s Housing Cr
